metadata.title: CVE-2024-47743 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:KEYS: prevent NULL pointer dereference in find_asymmetric_key()In find_asymmetric_key(), if all NULLs are passed in the id_{0,1,2}arguments, the kernel will first emit WARN but then have an oopsbecause id_2 gets dereferenced anyway.Add the missing id_2 check and move WARN_ON() to the final else branchto avoid duplicate NULL checks.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with Svace staticanalysis tool.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
